data.name: Prince of Suburbia - Part 1
data.detailed_description:
Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic (linear) adult visual novel that will never leave you with blue balls. Simple sandbox navigation leads through a silly story full of hot women just waiting to seduce you, and be seduced by you.

*Relationships marked with an asterisk are fully customizable.

Medical research gone awry
Your stepmom* Catherine is a medical researcher who is drowning in bills. She needs to prove her new fertility medication is safe for human consumption, and fast. How will the side effects of this experimental drug affect her, and those around her?



Naughty neighbors
Your M.I.L.F. neighbor, Naomi, and her daughter, Heather, have devious plans for you and the women you live with. Will you fall victim to their seductions, or turn the tables on them?



A crowded home
Your stepsister* Sarah is struggling with her own issues and seems to push away everyone who cares about her. Will she ever open up to you and accept your… help?

To add to the chaos, stepaunt* Sonia and stepcousin* Fiona also need a place to stay. Will they be polite houseguests welcomed with open arms, or will they make themselves a little too comfortable?

data.short_description: Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic (linear) adult visual novel with only one thing on its mind. This simple sandbox game is packed with lewd scenes and sprinkled with a fun story that aims to never leave you wanting more.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
[b]Prince of Suburbia[/b] includes explicit sex, language, and drug use. All characters in the game are 18+ and all sexual acts in the game are consensual. Must be 18 years or older to play.

This is Part One of a two-part game. Part One includes big breasts, lactation, adult breastfeeding, light femdom, light BDSM, voyeurism, masturbation, sex toys, harem, lesbians, and light cumflation, blindfolds, and impregnation. Most relationships are fully customizable. 

Fetishes planned for the future include more impregnation, pregnancy, pregnancy sex, light maledom, threesomes (MFF), and spanking.

There are situations in the game with blindfolds where characters are consenting to sexual acts but are unaware of who exactly their partners are. There are also situations where sexual acts are done to a character that is sleeping but has already consented to/wants to be sexual with the other character. Lastly, there is implied drug use to deal with painful feelings.
